title: Gearty Grilling: Heather Jones on World War I
itunes:author: Dr Heather Jones
description:
Contributor(s): Dr Heather Jones | Dr Heather Jones, of the Department of International History, talks to Conor Gearty about why Britain willingly entered the First World War, and the socio-historical role the conflict plays in shaping national identity today.
Socio-historical role the conflict plays in shaping national identity today.
itunes:summary:
